snippet.title: Penumbra: Overture - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Penumbra: Overture accompanying the launch of the game. Published 30 March 2007.

Penumbra: Overture is a first-person survival/psycho horror adventure with an focus on exploration and solving puzzles, developed by Frictional Games (Amnesia series, SOMA).

The player follows the story of the physicist Philip who's following  mysterious clues to a remote facility in uninhabited northern Greenland.

Platforms (release date):
- Windows PC (30 March 2007)
- Linux (25 May 2007)
- Mac OS X (10 January 2008)
